name: Forkbite
description:
Created in under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41.

Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

Forkbite combines the rolling ball and battle royale genres for a slow paced rollathon. Tumble your greasy meatball around while dodging forks to claim victory royale!

Controls:
WASD / Left Analog Stick - Roll around
Escape / Gamepad Special Right - Pause
